member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ApplicationRole.Grant(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: 授予指定的权限集以及针对应用程序角色对其他用户授予权限集的能力。

A value that specifies the role that the user assumes when granting the specified set of permissions to other users on the application role. Use this parameter for grantees who are members of more than one role.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ApplicationRole.Revoke(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.AsymmetricKey.Grant(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 向被授权者授予针对指定权限的访问权限以及向非对称密钥的其他用户进行授权的能力。
member.param: A object that specifies the set of permissions.
A value that specifies the grantee to be denied specified set of permissions.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to grant the set of permissions to other users on the asymmetric key.If True, the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the asymmetric key.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the asymmetric key.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.AsymmetricKey.Grant(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: 向被授权者授予针对指定权限的访问权限以及向非对称密钥的其他用户进行授权的能力。
member.param: A object that specifies the set of permissions.
A array that specifies a list of grantees to be denied access to the set of permissions.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the asymmetric key. If True, the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the asymmetric key.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the asymmetric key.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.AsymmetricKey.Grant(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: 向被授权者授予指定的权限集以及基于假定角色向非对称密钥的其他用户授予权限集的能力。
member.param: A object that specifies the permission.
A value that specifies a grantee to be denied access to the permission.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the asymmetric key.If True, the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the asymmetric key.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the asymmetric key.

A value that specifies the role that the user assumes when granting the specified set of permissions to other users on the asymmetric key. Use this parameter for grantees who are members of more than one role.

A value that specifies the role that the user assumes when granting the specified set of permissions to other users on the asymmetric key. Use this parameter for grantees who are members of more than one role.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.AsymmetricKey.Revoke(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 针对非对称密钥的某个被授权者以及该被授权者向其授予指定权限集的任何其他用户，撤消以前授予的权限。还将向该被授权者授予从假定角色中的其他用户撤消指定权限集的能力。
member.param: A object that specifies the set of permissions.
A value that specifies a grantee to be revoked the set of permissions.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the asymmetric key.If True, the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the asymmetric key.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the asymmetric key.

A property that specifies whether users, to whom the grantee has granted the specified set of permissions, are also revoked the set of permissions.If True, the grantee and users to whom the grantee granted the specified set of permission are all revoked the specified set of permissions on the asymmetric key.If False, only the grantee is revoked the specified set of permissions.

member.param: A object that specifies the set of permissions.
A array that specifies a list of grantees to be revoked access to the set of permissions.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the asymmetric key.If True, the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the asymmetric key.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the asymmetric key.

A property that specifies whether users, to whom the grantee has granted the specified set of permissions, are also revoked the set of permissions.If True, the grantee and users to whom the grantee granted the specified set of permission are all revoked the specified set of permissions on the asymmetric key.If False, only the grantee is revoked the specified set of permissions.

Column Data type Description GranteeThe name of the principal that received the permission.GrantorThe name of the principal that granted, revoked, or denied permission.PermissionStateThe numeric value that represents the ASCII character code for the first letter of the permission state. Deny = 68, Revoke = 82, and Grant = 71.CodeThe code that specifies the permission type. See sys.database_permissions (Transact-SQL).ObjectClassThe type of object to which permission is granted. member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.CpuCollection.SetAffinityToAll(System.Boolean)
member.summary: 为某一 SQL Server 实例上的所有 CPU 设置关联掩码。
member.param: If true, affinity is set for each CPU in the specified range. If false, the affinity state is removed from each CPU in the specified range.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.CpuCollection.SetAffinityToRange(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 为指定范围中的 CPU 设置关联掩码。
member.param: An from 0 to -1 that specifies the beginning of the range of CPUs. If startIndex is not within the valid range, the following exception is returned: Specified argument was out of the range of valid values. Parameter name: startIndex.

An that specifies the endIndex of the range. endIndex must be greater than or equal to startIndex and less than If endIndex is not within the valid range, the following exception is returned: Specified argument was out of the range of valid values. Parameter name: endIndexd.If endIndex is less than startIndex, the following exception is returned: The specified range of CPUs is not valid. The value for startIndex must be less than the value for endIndex.
If true, affinity is set to each CPU in the specified range. If false, affinity is removed from each CPU in the specified range.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Database.EnumLocks
member.summary: 枚举数据库上持有的所有当前锁的列表。
member.returns: A object value that contains a list of locks held on the database and information about the type and location of the locks. The table describes the different columns of the returned . Column Data type DescriptionRequestorSpidThe system process ID value of the process that is holding a lock on a database resource.LockTypeThe description of the type of lock. See the syslockinfo table for a description of different lock types.DatabaseThe name of the database on which the lock is held.TableThe name of the table on which the lock is held. This field contains a value only if the lock is held on a table.IndexThe name of the index on which the lock is held. This field contains a value only if the lock is held on an index.StatusThe status of the lock, which can be one of the following:1 = Granted.2 = Converting.3 = Waiting.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Database.EnumLocks(System.Int32)
member.summary: 为指定的系统进程 ID 枚举数据库上持有的当前锁的列表。
member.returns: A object value that contains a list of locks held on the database and information about the type and location of the locks. The table describes the different columns of the returned . ColumnData typeDescriptionRequestorSpidThe system process ID value of the process that is holding a lock on a database resource.LockTypeThe description of the type of lock. See the syslockinfo table for a description of different lock types.DatabaseThe name of the database on which the lock is held.TableThe name of the table on which the lock is held. This field contains a value only if the lock is held on a table.IndexThe name of the index on which the lock is held. This field contains a value only if the lock is held on an index.StatusThe status of the lock, which can be one of the following:1 = Granted.2 = Converting.3 = Waiting.
member.param: An that specifies the process ID value that uniquely identifies the process.

A value that specifies the grantee to be denied specified set of permissions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Database.Grant(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabasePermissionSet,System.String[],System.Boolean)

member.param: A object value that specifies the set of permissions.
A array that specifies a list of grantees to be denied access to the set of permissions.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the database. If True, the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the database.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the database.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Database.Grant(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabasePermissionSet,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)

member.param: A object value that specifies the set of permissions.
A value that specifies a grantee to be denied access to the permission.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the database.If True, the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the database.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the database.

A value that specifies the role that the user assumes when that user grants the specified set of permissions to other users on the database. Use this parameter for grantees who are members of more than one role.

member.param: A object value that specifies the set of permissions.
A value that specifies a grantee to be revoked the set of permissions.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the database.If True, the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the database.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the database.

A property that specifies whether users, to whom the grantee has granted the specified set of permissions, are also revoked the set of permissions.If True, the grantee and users to whom the grantee granted the specified set of permission are all revoked the specified set of permissions on the database.If False, only the grantee is revoked the specified set of permissions.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseDdlTrigger.AnsiNullsStatus
member.summary: 获取或设置 属性值，该值指定是否在数据定义语言 (DDL) 触发器中启用 ISO NULL 处理。

ISO NULL handling requires that any comparison to a NULL value equates to a NULL value.If True, ISO NULL handling is enabled and comparisons to null values equate to False.If False (default), ISO NULL handling is disabled and comparisons to null values equate to True.

member.summary: 对象表示 Microsoft SQL Server 数据库事件通知所需的设置。

member.name: E:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseEvents.ServerEvent
member.summary: 指定当 对象中发生事件和该用户已从该对象实例订阅事件时引发的事件。

member.summary: 返回当前选定的事件通知。

member.summary: 开始接收事件。

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseEvents.StopEvents
member.summary: 停止接收事件。

member.summary: 指定要接收的数据库事件。
member.param: A object that specifies the set of events to receive.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseEvents.SubscribeToEvents(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseEventSet,Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ServerEventHandler)
member.summary: 指定要接收的数据库事件以及处理这些事件的事件处理程序。
member.param: A object that specifies the set of events to receive.
A object that handles the events that are received.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseEvents.UnsubscribeAllEvents
member.summary: 清除所有事件设置，并删除所有事件处理程序。

member.summary: 设置快照隔离级别。
member.param: A value that specifies whether the snapshot isolation level is enabled.If True, the snapshot isolation level is enabled. Otherwise, False.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.AnsiNullDefault
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 ANSI_NULL_DEFAULT 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the ANSI_NULL_DEFAULT database option is active.If True, user-defined data types default to allowing NULL values. Otherwise, False (default).

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.AnsiNullsEnabled
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 ANSI_NULLS_ENABLED 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the ANSI_NULLS_ENABLED database option is active. If True, comparisons to null values equate to false.If False (default), comparisons to null values equate to true.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.AnsiPaddingEnabled
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 ANSI_PADDING_ENABLED 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the ANSI_PADDING_ENABLED database option is active.If True, trailing blanks inserted into variable-length columns are not trimmed. Otherwise, False (default).

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.AnsiWarningsEnabled
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 ANSI_WARNING_ENABLED 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the ANSI_WARNING_ENABLED database option is active.If True, warnings are issued when null values are encountered in a statement. Otherwise, False (default).

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.ArithmeticAbortEnabled
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 ARITHMETICABORT 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the ARITHMETICABORT database option is active.If True, a transaction is stopped and rolled back when an arithmetic error occurs. Otherwise, False (default).

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.AutoClose
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 AUTOCLOSE 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the AUTOCLOSE database option is active.If True, the database is closed, and its resources are freed when no user connection accesses the database. Otherwise, False (default).

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.AutoCreateStatistics
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 AUTOCREATESTATISTICS 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: value that specifies whether the AUTOCREATESTATISTICS database option is active.If True, statistics are automatically created. Otherwise, False (default).

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.AutoShrink
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 AUTOSHRINK 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the AUTOSHRINK database option is active. If True, the database is automatically reduced. Otherwise, False (default).

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.AutoUpdateStatistics
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 AUTOUPDATESTATISTICS 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the AUTOUPDATESTATISTICS database option is active.If True, statistics are automatically updated. Otherwise, False (default).

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.AutoUpdateStatisticsAsync
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 AUTOUPDATESTATISTICSASYNC 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the AUTOUPDATESTATISTICSASYNC database option is active.If True, statistics are automatically updated. Otherwise, False (default).

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.BrokerEnabled
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定是否启用Service Broker服务。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the Service Broker service is enabled.If True, statistics are automatically updated. Otherwise, False (default).

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.CloseCursorsOnCommitEnabled
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 CURSOR_CLOSE_ON_COMMIT 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the CURSOR_CLOSE_ON_COMMIT database option is active.If True, the cursor is closed when a transaction commits. Otherwise, False (default).

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.ConcatenateNullYieldsNull
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 CONCAT_NULL_YIELDS_NULL 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the CONCAT_NULL_YIELDS_NULL database option is active.If True, the concatenated result is NULL.If False (default), the value is concatenated with a zero string.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.DatabaseOwnershipChaining
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定数据库所有权链接是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the database ownership chaining is active.If True, database ownership chaining is active. Otherwise, False (default).

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.DateCorrelationOptimization
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定日期关联优化是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the date correlation optimization is active.If True, date correlation optimization is active. Otherwise, False (default).

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.IsParameterizationForced
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定是否对数据库强制执行参数化。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether parameterization is forced on the database.If True, parameterization is forced. Otherwise, False (default).

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.LocalCursorsDefault
member.summary: 获取 值，该值指定默认情况下是否使用本地服务器游标。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether local cursors are used by default.If True, local cursors are used.If False (default), local cursors are not used and the cursors are implemented at the client.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.MirroringRedoQueueMaxSize
member.summary: 获取或设置镜像服务器实例的重做队列的最大大小 (KB)。
member.returns: An integer value that specifies maximum size of the redo queue of the mirror server instance in KB.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.MirroringTimeout
member.summary: 获取或设置主体服务器实例在认为其他实例断开连接之前等待来自镜像会话中一个实例的 PING 消息的最长时间（秒）。
member.returns: An Integer value that specifies the mirroring time-out period, in seconds, on the principal server instance.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.NumericRoundAbortEnabled
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 NUMERIC_ROUNDABORT 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether there is a loss of precision due to rounding in an expression causes an error.If True, an error is generated and no results are returned.If False (default), a warning is generated and a NULL is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.PageVerify
member.summary: 指定在读取数据库页时 Microsoft SQL Server 执行的页完整性检查的类型。
member.returns: A object value that specifies the type of page integrity check performed when SQL Server reads database pages.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.Parent
member.summary: 获取是 对象的父对象的 对象。
member.returns: A object that owns the object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.Properties
member.summary: 获取表示对象属性的 对象的集合。
member.returns: A object value that specifies the collection of properties that are associated with the object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.QuotedIdentifiersEnabled
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定由双引号 (" ") 分隔的标识符是否为 Transact-SQL 保留关键字，或者是否包含 Transact-SQL 语法规则通常不允许的字符。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether identifiers delimited by double quotation marks are Transact-SQL reserved keywords or contain characters not usually allowed by the Transact-SQL syntax rules.If True, identifiers delimited by double quotation marks are interpreted as object identifiers.If False, identifiers delimited by double quotation marks are strings that contain characters not usually allowed by the Transact-SQL syntax rules, such as apostrophes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.ReadOnly
member.summary: 获取或设置 属性值，该值指定数据库是否为只读。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the database is read-only.If True, the database is read-only. Otherwise, False (default).

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.RecoveryModel
member.summary: 获取或设置数据库的恢复模式。
member.returns: A object value that specifies the recovery model that is currently in operation on the database.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.RecursiveTriggersEnabled
member.summary: 属性或设置 值，该值指定是否对数据库启用递归触发器。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether recursive triggers are enabled on the database.If True, recursive triggers are enabled. Otherwise, False (default).

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseOptions.SnapshotIsolationState

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseRole.Grant(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 向被授权者授予针对指定权限的访问权限，并向数据库角色的其他用户授予进行授权的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A value that specifies the grantee to be denied specified set of permissions.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to grant the set of permissions to other users on the database role.If True, the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the database role.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the database role.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseRole.Grant(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: 向被授权者授予针对指定权限的访问权限，并向数据库角色的其他用户授予进行授权的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A array that specifies a list of grantees to be denied access to the set of permissions.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the database role. If True, the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the database role.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the database role.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseRole.Grant(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: 基于假定的角色针对数据库角色的其他用户的权限。
member.param: An object that specifies the permission.
A value that specifies a grantee to be denied access to the permission.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the database role.If True, the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the database role.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the database role.

A value that specifies the role that the user assumes when granting the specified set of permissions to other users on the database role. Use this parameter for grantees who are members of more than one role.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseRole.Grant(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String[],System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: 向被授权者授予指定的权限集，并在假定角色下向数据库角色的其他用户授予就权限集进行授权的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A array that specifies a list of grantees to be granted the set of permissions.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to grant the set of permissions to other users on the database role.If True, the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the database role.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the database role.

A value that specifies the role that the user assumes when granting the specified set of permissions to other users on the database role. Use this parameter for grantees who are members of more than one role.

A value that specifies a grantee to be revoked the set of permissions.

member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A array that specifies a list of grantees to be revoked the set of permissions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.DatabaseRole.Revoke(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 从数据库角色的某个被授权者以及该被授权者向其授予指定权限集的任何其他用户，撤消以前授予的权限。还将向该被授权者授予从假定角色中的其他用户撤消指定权限集的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A value that specifies a grantee to be revoked the set of permissions.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the database role.If True, the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the database role.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the database role.

A property that specifies whether users, to whom the grantee has granted the specified set of permissions, are also revoked the set of permissions.If True, the grantee and users to whom the grantee granted the specified set of permission are all revoked the specified set of permissions on the database role.If False, only the grantee is revoked the specified set of permissions.

member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.

A value that specifies a grantee to be revoked the set of permissions.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the endpoint.If True, the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the endpoint.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the endpoint.

A property that specifies whether users, to whom the grantee has granted the specified set of permissions, are also revoked the set of permissions.If True, the grantee and users to whom the grantee granted the specified set of permission are all revoked the specified set of permissions on the endpoint.If False, only the grantee is revoked the specified set of permissions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Endpoint.Revoke(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String[],System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 从端点的某些被授权者以及这些被授权者向其授予指定权限集的任何其他用户，撤消以前授予的权限。还将向这些被授权者授予从假定角色中的其他用户撤消指定权限集的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A array that specifies a list of grantees to be revoked access to the set of permissions.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the endpoint.If True, the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the endpoint.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the endpoint.

A property that specifies whether users, to whom the grantee has granted the specified set of permissions, are also revoked the set of permissions.If True, the grantee and users to whom the grantee granted the specified set of permission are all revoked the specified set of permissions on the endpoint.If False, only the grantee is revoked the specified set of permissions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Endpoint.Revoke(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: 从端点的某个被授权者以及该被授权者向其授予指定权限集的任何其他用户，撤消以前授予的权限。还将向该被授权者授予从假定角色中的其他用户撤消指定权限集的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A value that specifies a grantee to be revoked access to the set of permissions.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the endpoint.If True, the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions to other users on the endpoint.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions to other users on the endpoint.

A property that specifies whether users to whom the grantee has granted the specified set of permissions are also revoked the set of permissions.If True, the grantee and users to whom the grantee granted the specified set of permission are all revoked the specified set of permissions on the endpoint.If False, only the grantee is revoked the specified set of permissions.

A value that specifies the role that the user assumes when revoking the specified set of permission from other users on the endpoint. Use this parameter for grantees who are members of more than one role.

A value that specifies the grantee to be denied the specified set of permissions on the extended stored procedure.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ExtendedStoredProcedure.Deny(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String[])
member.summary: 对扩展存储过程的指定被授权者拒绝指定的权限集。
member.param: An object value that specifies the set of permissions.
A array that specifies a list of grantees to be denied the specified set of permissions on the extended stored procedure.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ExtendedStoredProcedure.Deny(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 对指定的被授权者以及该被授权者向其授予针对扩展存储过程的指定权限集的其他用户，拒绝指定的权限集。
member.param: An object value that specifies the set of permissions.
A value that specifies the grantee to be denied the specified set of permissions on the extended stored procedure.

A property that specifies whether users, to whom the grantee granted the specified set of permission, are also denied access to the specified set of permissions on the extended stored procedure.If True, the grantee and users to which the grantee granted the specified set of permissions are all denied the specified set of permissions.If False, only the grantee is denied the specified set of permissions.

member.param: An object value that specifies the set of permissions.
A array that specifies a list of grantees to be denied the specified set of permissions.

A property that specifies whether users, to whom the grantee granted the specified set of permission, are also denied access to the specified set of permissions on the extended stored procedure.If True, the grantee and users to which the grantee granted the specified set of permissions are all denied the specified set of permissions.If False, only the grantee is denied the specified set of permissions.

member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A value that specifies the grantee to be granted the specified set of permissions on the extended stored procedure.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ExtendedStoredProcedure.Grant(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String[])
member.summary: 向针对扩展存储过程的指定被授权者授予指定的权限集。
member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A array that lists the grantees to be granted the specified set of permissions on the extended stored procedure.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ExtendedStoredProcedure.Grant(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 向被授权者授予针对指定权限的访问权限以及向扩展存储过程的其他用户进行授权的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A value that specifies the grantee to be denied specified set of permissions.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to grant the set of permissions to other users on the extended stored procedure.If True, the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the extended stored procedure.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the extended stored procedure.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ExtendedStoredProcedure.Grant(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: 向被授权者授予针对指定权限的访问权限以及向扩展存储过程的其他用户进行授权的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A array that specifies a list of grantees to be denied access to the set of permissions.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the extended stored procedure. If True, the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the extended stored procedure.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the extended stored procedure.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ExtendedStoredProcedure.Grant(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: 向被授权者授予指定的权限集以及基于假定角色向扩展存储过程的其他用户授予权限集的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the permission.
A value that specifies a grantee to be denied access to the permission.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the extended stored procedure.If True, the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the extended stored procedure.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the extended stored procedure.

A value that specifies the role that the user assumes when granting the specified set of permissions to other users on the extended stored procedure. Use this parameter for grantees who are members of more than one role.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ExtendedStoredProcedure.Grant(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String[],System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: 向被授权者授予指定的权限集以及基于假定角色向扩展存储过程的其他用户授予权限集的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A array that specifies a list of grantees to be granted the set of permissions.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to grant the set of permissions to other users on the extended stored procedure.If True, the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the extended stored procedure.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the extended stored procedure.

A value that specifies the role that the user assumes when granting the specified set of permissions to other users on the extended stored procedure. Use this parameter for grantees who are members of more than one role.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ExtendedStoredProcedure.Revoke(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String)
member.summary: 从扩展存储过程的某个被授权者撤消以前授予的权限集。
member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A value that specifies a grantee to be revoked the set of permissions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ExtendedStoredProcedure.Revoke(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String[])
member.summary: 从扩展存储过程的被授权者列表撤消以前授予的权限集。
member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A array that specifies a list of grantees to be revoked the set of permissions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ExtendedStoredProcedure.Revoke(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 从扩展存储过程的某个被授权者以及该被授权者向其授予指定权限集的任何其他用户，撤消以前授予的权限。还将向该被授权者授予从假定角色中的其他用户撤消指定权限集的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A value that specifies a grantee to be revoked the set of permissions.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the extended stored procedure.If True, the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the extended stored procedure.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the extended stored procedure.

A property that specifies whether users, to whom the grantee has granted the specified set of permissions, are also revoked the set of permissions.If True, the grantee and users to whom the grantee granted the specified set of permission are all revoked the specified set of permissions on the extended stored procedure.If False, only the grantee is revoked the specified set of permissions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ExtendedStoredProcedure.Revoke(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String[],System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 从扩展存储过程的被授权者以及被授权者向其授予指定权限集的任何其他用户，撤消以前授予的权限。还将向这些被授权者授予从假定角色中的其他用户撤消指定权限集的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A array that specifies a list of grantees to be revoked access to the set of permissions.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the extended stored procedure.If True, the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the extended stored procedure.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the extended stored procedure.

A property that specifies whether users, to whom the grantee has granted the specified set of permissions, are also revoked the set of permissions.If True, the grantee and users to whom the grantee granted the specified set of permission are all revoked the specified set of permissions on the extended stored procedure.If False, only the grantee is revoked the specified set of permissions.

A value that specifies the role that the user assumes when revoking the specified set of permission from other users on the extended stored procedure. Use this parameter for grantees who are members of more than one role.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ExtendedStoredProcedure.Revoke(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String[],System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: 从扩展存储过程的被授权者以及被授权者向其授予指定权限集的任何其他用户，撤消以前授予的权限。还将向这些被授权者授予从假定角色中的其他用户撤消指定权限集的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A array that specifies a list of grantees to be revoked access to the set of permissions.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the extended stored procedure.If True, the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions to other users on the extended stored procedure.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions to other users on the extended stored procedure.

A property that specifies whether users to whom the grantee has granted the specified set of permissions are also revoked the set of permissions.If True, the grantee and users to whom the grantee granted the specified set of permission are all revoked the specified set of permissions on the extended stored procedure.If False, only the grantee is revoked the specified set of permissions.

A value that specifies the role that the user assumes when revoking the specified set of permission from other users on the extended stored procedure. Use this parameter for grantees who are members of more than one role.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.FullTextStopList.Deny(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 对指定的被授权者以及该被授权者向其授予针对全文非索引字表的指定权限集的其他用户，拒绝指定的权限集。

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.FullTextStopList.Revoke(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 从全文非索引字表的某个被授予者以及该被授权者向其授予指定权限集的任何其他用户，撤消以前授予的权限集。还将向该被授权者授予从其他用户撤消指定权限集的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A value that specifies a grantee to be revoked the set of permissions.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the full-text stop list.If True, the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the full-text stop list.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the full-text stop list.

A property that specifies whether users, to whom the grantee has granted the specified set of permissions, are also revoked the set of permissions.If True, the grantee and users to whom the grantee granted the specified set of permission are all revoked the specified set of permissions on the full-text stop list.If False, only the grantee is revoked the specified set of permissions.

member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A array that specifies a list of grantees to be revoked the set of permissions.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the full-text stop list.If True, the grantee is given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the full-text stop list.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to revoke the specified set of permissions from other users on the full-text stop list.

A property that specifies whether users, to whom the grantee has granted the specified set of permissions, are also revoked the set of permissions.If True, the grantee and users to whom the grantee granted the specified set of permission are all revoked the specified set of permissions on the full-text stop list.If False, only the grantee is revoked the specified set of permissions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IColumnPermission.Grant(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String[],System.String[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: 对针对被引用列的指定被授权者授予对指定权限的访问，并向其授予向其他用户授权的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the permission.
A array value that specifies the grantees to be granted access to the set of permissions.
A array that specifies the names of the columns to which the permission is granted.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to grant access to the referenced columns for other users.If True, the grantee is given the ability to grant other users access to the referenced columns.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to deny other users access to the referenced columns.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IColumnPermission.Grant(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String,System.String[],System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: 基于假定角色，对针对被引用列的指定被授权者授予对指定权限集的访问，并向其授予向其他用户授权的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A value that specifies a grantee to be granted access to the set of permissions.
A array that specifies the names of the columns to which the permission is granted.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to grant access to the referenced columns for other users.If True, the grantee is given the ability to grant other users access to the referenced columns.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to grant other users access to the referenced columns.
A value that specifies the role that the user assumes when granting access to the referenced columns to other users. Use this parameter for grantees who are members of more than one role.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IColumnPermission.Grant(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String[],System.String[],System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: 基于假定角色，对针对被引用列的指定被授权者授予对指定权限集的访问，并向其授予向其他用户授权的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A array value that specifies a list of grantees to be granted access to the set of permissions.
A array that specifies the names of the columns to which the permission is granted.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to grant access to the referenced columns for other users.If True, the grantee is given the ability to grant other users access to the referenced columns.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to grant other users access to the referenced columns.
A value that specifies the role that the user assumes when granting access to the referenced columns to other users. Use this parameter for grantees who are members of more than one role.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IColumnPermission.Revoke(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: 从针对被引用列的某个被授权者撤消以前授予的权限。
member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A value that specifies a grantee to be revoked access to the set of permissions.
A array that specifies the names of the columns to which the permission is revoked.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IColumnPermission.Revoke(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String[],System.String[])
member.summary: 从针对被引用列的被授权者列表撤消以前授予的权限。
member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A array value that specifies a list of grantees to be revoked access to the set of permissions.
A array that specifies the names of the columns to which the permission is revoked.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IColumnPermission.Revoke(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String,System.String[],System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 从针对被引用列的被授予者以及被授权者向其授予访问权限的任何其他用户，撤消以前授予的权限。还将向这些被授权者授予撤消其他用户的访问权限的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A value that specifies a grantee to be revoked access to the set of permissions.
A array value that specifies the names of the columns to which the set of permissions is revoked.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to revoke access from the referenced columns for other users.If True, the grantee is given the ability to revoke other users' access from the referenced columns.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to revoke other users' access from the referenced columns.

A property that specifies whether users that the grantee has granted access to the permission are also revoked access from the permission.If True, the grantee and users to which the grantee granted access to the permission are all revoked access from the permission.If False, only the grantee is revoked access from the permission.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IColumnPermission.Revoke(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String[],System.String[],System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 从针对存储过程的被授权者列表以及该被授权者向其授予访问权限集的任何其他用户，撤消以前授予的权限。还将向该被授权者授予在假定角色下撤消其他用户的访问权限的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.
A array value that specifies a list of grantees to be revoked access to the set of permissions.
A array value that specifies the names of the columns to which the set of permissions is revoked.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to revoke access from the referenced columns for other users.If True, the grantee is given the ability to revoke other users' access from the referenced columns.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to revoke other users' access from the referenced columns.

A property that specifies whether users that the grantee has granted access to the permission are also revoked access from the permission.If True, the grantee and users to which the grantee granted access to the permission are all revoked access from the permission.If False, only the grantee is revoked access from the permission.

member.param: An object that specifies the set of permissions.

A value that specifies the role that the user assumes when revoking access from the referenced columns for other users. Use this parameter for grantees who are members of more than one role.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseMaintenanceFacet
member.summary: 用于定义数据库维护方面的方法和属性的接口。

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseMaintenanceFacet.DataAndBackupOnSeparateLogicalVolumes
member.summary: 一个布尔值，该值指示数据和备份是否位于单独的逻辑卷上。
member.returns: If True Data and Backup are on separate logical volumes.If False Data and Backup are not on separate logical volumes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseMaintenanceFacet.LastBackupDate
member.summary: 获取最后一次数据库备份的日期时间。

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseMaintenanceFacet.LastLogBackupDate
member.summary: 获取最后一次日志备份的日期时间。

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseMaintenanceFacet.PageVerify
member.summary: 获取或设置在读取数据库页时 SQL Server 执行的页完整性检查的类型。

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseMaintenanceFacet.ReadOnly
member.summary: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指定数据库是否为只读。
member.returns: If True the database is read only.If False the database is not read only.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseMaintenanceFacet.RecoveryModel
member.summary: 获取或设置数据库的恢复模式。

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseMaintenanceFacet.Status
member.summary: 获取 DatabaseStatus 对象。

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions
member.summary: 具有公开数据库选项的属性的接口。

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.AnsiNullDefault
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 ANSI_NULL_DEFAULT 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the ANSI_NULL_DEFAULT database option is active.If True, user-defined data types default to allowing NULL values.If False (default), user-defined data types default to not allowing NULL values.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.AnsiNullsEnabled
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 ANSI_NULLS_ENABLED 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the ANSI_NULLS_ENABLED database option is active. If True, comparisons to null values equate to false.If False (default), comparisons to null values equate to true.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.AnsiPaddingEnabled
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 ANSI_PADDING_ENABLED 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the ANSI_PADDING_ENABLED database option is active.If True, trailing blanks inserted into variable-length columns are not trimmed.If False (default), blanks inserted into variable-length columns are trimmed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.AnsiWarningsEnabled
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 ANSI_WARNING_ENABLED 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the ANSI_WARNING_ENABLED database option is active.If True, warnings are issued when null values are encountered in a statement.If False (default), warnings are not issued when null values are encountered in statements.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.ArithmeticAbortEnabled
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 ARITHMETICABORT 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the ARITHMETICABORT database option is active.If True, a transaction is stopped and rolled back when an arithmetic error occurs.If False (default), a transaction continues when an arithmetic error occurs.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.AutoClose
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 AUTOCLOSE 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the AUTOCLOSE database option is active.If True, the database is closed, and its resources are freed when no user connection accesses the database.If False (default), the server maintains the database in an open and ready state regardless of user activity.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.AutoCreateStatisticsEnabled
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 AUTOCREATESTATISTICS 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the AUTOCREATESTATISTICS database option is active.If True, statistics are automatically created.If False (default), statistics are not automatically created.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.AutoShrink
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 AUTOSHRINK 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the AUTOSHRINK database option is active. If True, the database is automatically reduced.If False (default), statistics are not automatically reduced.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.AutoUpdateStatisticsAsync
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 AUTOUPDATESTATISTICSASYNC 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the AUTOUPDATESTATISTICSASYNC database option is active.If True, statistics are automatically updated.If False (default), statistics are not automatically updated.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.AutoUpdateStatisticsEnabled
member.summary: 指定是否自动更新数据库统计信息。
member.returns: A value indicating whether statistics are updated automatically. If True, statistics are updated. Otherwise, False.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.BrokerEnabled
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定是否启用 Service Broker 服务。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the Service Broker service is enabled.If True, statistics are automatically updated.If False (default), statistics are not automatically updated.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.ChangeTrackingAutoCleanUp
member.summary: 获取或设置一个布尔属性值，该值指定是否启用 CHANGE_TRACKING_AUTO_CLEANUP 选项。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether change tracking information is automatically removed.If True, change tracking information is automatically removed after a configurable retention period.If False (default), change tracking information is not automatically removed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.ChangeTrackingEnabled
member.summary: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用更改跟踪。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether change tracking information is supported by the database.If True, change tracking is enabled.If False (default), change tracking information is not enabled.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.ChangeTrackingRetentionPeriod
member.summary: 获取或设置指定更改跟踪信息保留多长的时间间隔。
member.returns: An Integer value that specifies how long change tracking information is retained, in units defined by the property.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.ChangeTrackingRetentionPeriodUnits
member.summary: 指定更改跟踪保持期的单位。
member.returns: A type that specifies the units for the retention period value.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.CloseCursorsOnCommitEnabled
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 CURSOR_CLOSE_ON_COMMIT 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the CURSOR_CLOSE_ON_COMMIT database option is active.If True, the cursor is closed when a transaction commits.If False (default), the cursor is not closed when a transaction commits.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.Collation
member.summary: 获取或设置数据库使用的默认排序规则。
member.returns: A value that specifies the name of the default collation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.CompatibilityLevel
member.summary: 获取或设置数据库的兼容级别。
member.returns: A value that specifies the compatibility level for a database.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.ConcatenateNullYieldsNull
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 CONCAT_NULL_YIELDS_NULL 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the CONCAT_NULL_YIELDS_NULL database option is active.If True, the concatenated result is NULL.If False (default), the value is concatenated with a zero string.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.CreateDate
member.summary: 获取创建数据库的日期和时间。
member.returns: A value specifying the date and time at which the database was created.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.DatabaseOwnershipChaining
member.summary: 指示属性所有权链接是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether database ownership chaining is active.If True, database ownership chaining is active.If False (default), database ownership chaining is inactive.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.DatabaseSnapshotBaseName
member.summary: 获取数据库的快照基础的名称。
member.returns: A value that specifies the name of the shapshot base.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.DateCorrelationOptimization
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定日期相关性优化是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the date correlation optimization is active.If True, date correlation optimization is active.If False (default), date correlation optimization is not active.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.DefaultFileGroup
member.summary: 获取数据库使用的默认文件组。
member.returns: A value that specifies the default file group for the database.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.DefaultFileStreamFileGroup
member.summary: 获取数据库使用的默认流文件组。
member.returns: A value that specifies the default stream file group for the database.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.EncryptionEnabled
member.summary: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为数据库启用加密。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether database encryption is enabled.If True, database encryption is enabled. Otherwise, False (default.)

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.HonorBrokerPriority
member.summary: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否确认 Broker 指定的优先级。
member.returns: A value that indicates whether the priority specified by the broker is acknowledged.If True, the broker priority is acknowledged. Otherwise, False (default.)

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.ID
member.summary: 获取数据库 ID 值。
member.returns: An Integer value that uniquely identifies the database.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.IsParameterizationForced
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定是否对数据库强制执行参数化。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether parameterization is forced on the database.If True, parameterization is forced.If False (default), parameterization is not forced.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.IsReadCommittedSnapshotOn
member.summary: 获取一个值，该值指定具有已提交读隔离级别的事务是否使用行版本控制。
member.returns: A value that indicates whether transactions with the read committed isolation level use row versioning.If True, the transactions use row versioning. Otherwise, False (default.)

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.IsSystemObject
member.summary: 指定数据库是系统对象还是用户定义的数据库。
member.returns: A value that indicates whether the database is a system object.If True, the database is a system object. If False, the database is user-defined.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.IsUpdateable
member.summary: 指示数据库是否可更新。
member.returns: A value that indicates whether the database is updateable, or if it read-only. If True, the database may be updated. Otherwise, False.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.LocalCursorsDefault
member.summary: 获取 值，该值指定默认情况下是否使用本地服务器游标。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether local cursors are used by default.If True, local cursors are used.If False (default), local cursors are not used and the cursors are implemented at the client.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.MirroringTimeout
member.summary: 获取或设置主体服务器实例在认为镜像会话中的另一实例断开连接之前等待来自该实例的 PING 消息的最长时间（秒）。
member.returns: An Integer value that specifies the mirroring time-out period, in seconds, on the principal server instance.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.Name
member.summary: 获取数据库的名称。
member.returns: A value containing the database name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.NumericRoundAbortEnabled
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定 NUMERIC_ROUNDABORT 数据库选项是否处于活动状态。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether there is a loss of precision due to rounding in an expression causes an error.If True, an error is generated and no results are returned.If False (default), a warning is generated and a NULL is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.Owner
member.summary: 获取数据库的所有者。
member.returns: A value that specifies the database owner.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.PageVerify
member.summary: 指定在读取数据库页时 SQL Server 执行的页完整性检查的类型。
member.returns: A object value that specifies the type of page integrity check performed when SQL Server reads database pages.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.PrimaryFilePath
member.summary: 获取主数据库文件路径。
member.returns: A value containing the primary file path.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.QuotedIdentifiersEnabled
member.summary: 获取或设置一个 属性值，该值指定由双引号 (" ") 分隔的标识符是否为 Transact-SQL 保留关键字，或者是否包含 Transact-SQL 语法规则通常不允许的字符。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether identifiers delimited by double quotation marks are Transact-SQL reserved keywords or contain characters not usually allowed by the Transact-SQL syntax rules.If True, identifiers delimited by double quotation marks are interpreted as object identifiers.If False, identifiers delimited by double quotation marks are strings that contain characters not usually allowed by the Transact-SQL syntax rules, such as apostrophes.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.ReadOnly
member.summary: 属性或设置 属性值，该值指定数据库是否为只读。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the database is read-only.If True, the database is read-only.If False (default), the database can be updated.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.RecoveryModel
member.summary: 获取或设置数据库的恢复模式。
member.returns: A object value that specifies the recovery model that is currently in operation on the database.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.RecursiveTriggersEnabled
member.summary: 获取或设置 值，该值指定是否对数据库启用递归触发器。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether recursive triggers are enabled on the database.If True, recursive triggers are enabled.If False (default), recursive triggers are not enabled.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.Trustworthy
member.summary: TRUSTWORTHY 数据库属性用于指明 SQL Server 实例是否信任该数据库以及其中的内容。
member.returns: A value specifying the Trustworthy property.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabaseOptions.UserAccess
member.summary: 获取或设置数据库用户访问。
member.returns: A object value that specifies the database user access.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabasePerformanceFacet
member.summary: 定义可用于测量和影响数据库性能的方法和属性。

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabasePerformanceFacet.AutoClose
member.summary: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在最后一个用户退出后数据库是否将自动关闭。
member.returns: A value that indicates whether the database will be closed automatically after the last user exits. Returns True if the database will be closed; otherwise, False.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabasePerformanceFacet.AutoShrink
member.summary: 指示数据库文件是否可作为定期收缩的对象。
member.returns: A value that indicates whether the database files can be shrunk automatically. Returns True if database files can be shrunk automatically; otherwise, False.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IDatabasePerformanceFacet.CollationMatchesModelOrMaster

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.IObjectPermission.Revoke(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String[],System.Boolean,System.Boolean)

A array that specifies a list of grantees to be revoked access to the permission.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to revoke access from the object for other users.If True, the grantee is given the ability to revoke other users' access from the SMO object.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to revoke other users' access from the SMO object.

A property that specifies whether users that the grantee has granted access to the permission are also revoked access from the permission.If True, the grantee and users to which the grantee granted access to the permission are all revoked access from the permission.If False, only the grantee is revoked access from the permission.

member.param: An object that specifies the permission.
A value that specifies a grantee to be revoked access to the permission.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to revoke access from the object for other users.If True, the grantee is given the ability to revoke other users' access from the SMO object.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to revoke other users' access from the SMO object.

A value that specifies the role that the user assumes when revoking access from the SMO object for other users. Use this parameter for grantees who are members of more than one role.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.LinkedServer.EnumColumns
member.summary: Enumerates a list of columns that can be accessed on the linked server.
member.returns: A object value that contains a list of tables that can be accessed on the linked server. The table describes the different columns of the returned . ColumnData typeDescriptionCOLUMN_SIZEThe number of significant digits in the column. The return value for the PRECISION column is in base 10.BUFFER_LENGTHThe transfer size of the data to and from the column.DECIMAL_DIGITSThe number of digits to the right of the decimal point.NUM_PREC_RADIXThe base for numeric data types.NULLABLEThe nullability of the column. 1 = NULL is possible. 0 = NOT NULL.REMARKSThis field always returns NULL.COLUMN_DEFThe default value of the column.SQL_DATA_TYPEThe value of the SQL data type as it appears in the TYPE field of the descriptor. This column is the same as the DATA_TYPE column, except for the DateTime and ISO interval data types. This column always returns a value.SQL_DATETIMEE_SUBThe subtype code for DateTime and ISO interval data types. For other data types, this column returns NULL.CHAR_OCTET_LENGTHThe maximum length in bytes of a character or integer data type column. For all other data types, this column returns NULL.ORDINAL_POSITIONThe ordinal position of the column in the table. The first column in the table is 1. This column always returns a value.IS_NULLABLEThe nullability of the column in the table. ISO rules are followed to determine nullability. An ISO SQL-compliant DBMS cannot return an empty string.YES = Column can include NULLS. NO = Column cannot include NULLS.This column returns a zero-length string if nullability is unknown.The value returned for this column is different from the value returned for the NULLABLE column.SS_DATA_TYPEThe ordinal position of the column in the table. The first column in the table is 1. This column always returns a value.

The return value for the PRECISION column is in base 10.BUFFER_LENGTHThe transfer size of the data to and from the column.DECIMAL_DIGITSThe number of digits to the right of the decimal point.NUM_PREC_RADIXThe base for numeric data types.NULLABLEThe nullability of the column. 1 = NULL is possible. 0 = NOT NULL.REMARKSThis field always returns NULL.COLUMN_DEFThe default value of the column.SQL_DATA_TYPEThe value of the SQL data type as it appears in the TYPE field of the descriptor. This column is the same as the DATA_TYPE column, except for the DateTime and ISO interval data types. This column always returns a value.SQL_DATETIMEE_SUBThe subtype code for DateTime and ISO interval data types. For other data types, this column returns NULL.CHAR_OCTET_LENGTHThe maximum length in bytes of a character or integer data type column. For all other data types, this column returns NULL.ORDINAL_POSITIONThe ordinal position of the column in the table. The first column in the table is 1. This column always returns a value.IS_NULLABLEThe nullability of the column in the table. ISO rules are followed to determine nullability. An ISO SQL-compliant DBMS cannot return an empty string.YES = Column can include NULLS. NO = Column cannot include NULLS.This column returns a zero-length string if nullability is unknown.The value returned for this column is different from the value returned for the NULLABLE column.SS_DATA_TYPEThe ordinal position of the column in the table. The first column in the table is 1. This column always returns a value.
member.param: A value that specifies the name of the table.
A value that specifies the name of the schema
A value that specifies the name of the database.
A value that specifies the name of the column.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.LinkedServer.EnumTables
member.summary: Enumerates a list of tables that are available on the linked server.
member.returns: A object value that contains a list of tables that can be accessed on the linked server. The table describes the different columns of the returned . ColumnData typeDescriptionTABLE_CATThe table qualifier name. Various DBMS products support three-part naming for tables (qualifier.owner.name). In SQL Server, this column represents the database name. In some other products, it represents the server name of the database environment of the table. This field can be NULL.TABLE_SCHEMThe owner of the table in the linked server. In SQL Server, this column represents the name of the database user who created the table. This field always returns a value.TABLE_NAMEThe name of the table in the linked server. This field always returns a value.TABLE_TYPEThe type of table: table, system table, or view.REMARKS SQL Server does not return a value for this column.

This field always returns a value.TABLE_NAMEThe name of the table in the linked server. member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.LinkedServer.CollationCompatible
member.summary: 获取或设置 属性值，该值指定链接服务器的默认排序规则是否与 SQL Server 的本地实例的默认排序规则兼容。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether the remote linked server is compatible with the collation on the local instance of SQL Server. If True, the linked server has a default collation that is compatible with the default collation on the local instance of SQL Server.If False (default), the linked server has a default collation that is incompatible with the default collation on the local instance of SQL Server. This means that data compared on the two servers may return unexpected results.

member.returns: A value that specifies the name of the collation to use when sorting data from the linked server.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the login account. If True, the grantee is given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the login account.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to grant the specified set of permissions to other users on the login account.

A value that specifies the role that the user assumes when granting the specified set of permissions to other users on the login account. Use this parameter for grantees who are members of more than one role.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet.Alter
member.summary: 获取或设置 属性值，该值指定在权限集中是否包括 ALTER 权限。该权限允许被授权者更改对象的除所有权之外的属性。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether to include the ALTER permission in the permission set.If True, the permission is included in the permission set.If False (default), the permission is excluded from the permission set.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet.Connect
member.summary: 获取或设置 属性值，该值指定在权限集中是否包括 CONNECT 权限。该权限允许被授权者在该对象和 SQL Server 的实例之间创建连接。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether to include the CONNECT permission in the permission set.If True, the permission is included in the permission set.If False (default), the permission is excluded from the permission set.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet.Control
member.summary: 获取或设置 属性值，该值指定在权限集中是否包括 CONTROL 权限。该权限赋予被授权者对对象的完全控制，包括对象的所有定义的权限、创建针对对象的权限的能力以及对子对象的完全控制。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether to include the CONTROL permission in the permission set.If True, the permission is included in the permission set.If False (default), the permission is excluded from the permission set.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet.Delete
member.summary: 获取或设置 属性值，该值指定在权限集中是否包括 DELETE 权限。该权限允许被授权者删除对象。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether to include the DELETE permission in the permission set.If True, the permission is included in the permission set.If False (default), the permission is excluded from the permission set.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet.Execute
member.summary: 获取或设置 属性值，该值指定在权限集中是否包括 EXECUTE 权限。该权限允许被授权者执行对象。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether to include the EXECUTE permission in the permission set.If True, the permission is included in the permission set.If False (default), the permission is excluded from the permission set.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet.Impersonate
member.summary: 获取或设置 属性值，该值指定在权限集中是否包括 IMPERSONATE 权限。该权限允许被授权者模拟用户或登录名。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether to include the IMPERSONATE permission in the permission set.If True, the permission is included in the permission set.If False (default), the permission is excluded from the permission set.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet.Insert
member.summary: 获取或设置 属性值，该值指定在权限集中是否包括 INSERT 权限。该权限允许被授权者向对象中插入数据。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether to include the Insert permission in the permission set.If True, the permission is included in the permission set.If False (default), the permission is excluded from the permission set.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet.Receive
member.summary: 获取或设置 属性值，该值指定在权限集中是否包括 RECEIVE 权限。该权限允许被授权者从 Service Broker 队列中接收消息。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether to include the RECEIVE permission in the permission set.If True, the permission is included in the permission set.If False (default), the permission is excluded from the permission set.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet.References
member.summary: 获取或设置 属性值，该值指定在权限集中是否包括 REFERENCES 权限。该权限允许被授权者引用对象中的数据。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether to include the REFERENCES permission in the permission set.If True, the permission is included in the permission set.If False (default), the permission is excluded from the permission set.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet.Select
member.summary: 获取或设置 属性值，该值指定在权限集中是否包括 SELECT 权限。该权限允许被授权者检索对象中的数据。
member.returns: A value that specifies whether to include the SELECT permission in the permission set.If True, the permission is included in the permission set.If False (default), the permission is excluded from the permission set.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet.Send
member.summary: 获取或设置 属性值，该值指定在权限集中是否包括 SEND 权限。该权限允许被授权者向 Service Broker 服务发送消息。

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet.TakeOwnership
member.summary: 获取或设置 属性值，该值指定在权限集中是否包括 TAKE OWNERSHIP 权限。该权限允许被授权者取得对象的所有权。
