A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to grant access to the object for other users.If True, the grantee is given the ability to grant other users access to the Service Broker service.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to deny other users access to the Service Broker service.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Broker.BrokerService.Grant(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: 对针对 Service Broker 服务的指定被授权者授予对指定权限的访问，并向其授予向其他用户授权的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the permission.
A value that specifies a grantee to be denied access to the permission.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to grant access to the object for other users.If True, the grantee is given the ability to grant other users access to the Service Broker service.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to grant other users access to the Service Broker service.
A value that specifies the role that the user assumes when granting access to the Service Broker service to other users. Use this parameter for grantees who are members of more than one role.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Broker.BrokerService.Grant(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String[],System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: 基于假定角色，对针对 Service Broker 服务的指定被授权者授予对指定权限的访问，并向其授予向其他用户授权的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the permission.
A array that specifies a list of grantees to be denied access to the permission.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to grant access to the object for other users.If True, the grantee is given the ability to grant other users access to the Service Broker service.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to grant other users access to the Service Broker service.
A value that specifies the role that the user assumes when granting access to the Service Broker service to other users. Use this parameter for grantees who are members of more than one role.

member.summary: 从针对 Service Broker 服务的某个被授权者撤消以前授予的权限。
member.param: An object that specifies the permission.
A value that specifies a grantee to be revoked access to the permission.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Broker.BrokerService.Revoke(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String[])
member.summary: 从针对 Service Broker 服务的被授权者列表撤消以前授予的权限。

A array that specifies a list of grantees to be revoked access to the permission.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Broker.BrokerService.Revoke(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 从针对 Service Broker 服务的某个被授权者以及该被授权者向其授予访问权限的任何其他用户，撤消以前授予的权限。还将向该被授权者授予撤消其他用户的访问权限的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the permission.
A value that specifies a grantee to be revoked access to the permission.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to revoke access from the object for other users.If True, the grantee is given the ability to revoke other users' access from the Service Broker service.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to revoke other users' access from the Service Broker service.

A property that specifies whether users who the grantee has granted access to the permission are also revoked access from the permission.If True, the grantee and users to which the grantee granted access to the permission are all revoked access from the permission.If False, only the grantee is revoked access from the permission.

A array that specifies a list of grantees to be revoked access to the permission.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Broker.ServiceQueue.Revoke(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: 从针对服务队列的某个被授权者以及该被授权者向其授予访问权限集的任何其他用户，撤消以前授予的权限。还将向该被授权者授予撤消其他用户的访问权限的能力。

A value that specifies a grantee to be revoked access to the permission.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to revoke access from the object for other users.If True, the grantee is given the ability to revoke other users' access from the service queue.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to revoke other users' access from the service queue.

A property that specifies whether users who the grantee has granted access to the permission are also revoked access from the permission.If True, the grantee and users to which the grantee granted access to the permission are all revoked access from the permission.If False, only the grantee is revoked access from the permission.

member.summary: 从针对服务路由的被授权者以及这些被授权者向其授予访问权限的任何其他用户，撤消以前授予的权限。还将向这些被授权者授予撤消其他用户的访问权限的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the permission.
A array that specifies a list of grantees to be revoked access to the permission.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to revoke access from the object for other users.If True, the grantee is given the ability to revoke other users' access from the service route.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to revoke other users' access from the service route.

A property that specifies whether users who the grantee has granted access to the permission are also revoked access from the permission.If True, the grantee and users to which the grantee granted access to the permission are all revoked access from the permission.If False, only the grantee is revoked access from the permission.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Broker.ServiceRoute.Revoke(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ObjectPermissionSet,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: 从针对服务路由的某个被授权者以及该被授权者向其授予访问权限的任何其他用户，撤消以前授予的权限。还将向该被授权者授予在假定角色下撤消其他用户的访问权限的能力。
member.param: An object that specifies the permission.
A value that specifies a grantee to be revoked access to the permission.

A property that specifies whether the grantee is given the ability to revoke access from the object for other users.If True, the grantee is given the ability to revoke other users' access from the service route.If False, the grantee is not given the ability to revoke other users' access from the service route.

A property that specifies whether users who the grantee has granted access to the permission are also revoked access from the permission.If True, the grantee and users to which the grantee granted access to the permission are all revoked access from the permission.If False, only the grantee is revoked access from the permission.
A value that specifies the role that the user assumes when revoking access from the service route for other users. Use this parameter for grantees who are members of more than one role.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Mail.MailServer.Alter
member.summary: 更新 SQL Server 实例上的任何 对象属性更改。

member.summary: 重命名邮件服务器。
member.param: A value that specifies the new name of the mail server.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Mail.MailServer.Script
member.summary: 生成可用于重新创建 SQL Server 数据库邮件服务器的 Transact-SQL 脚本。

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Mail.MailServer.Script(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.ScriptingOptions)
member.summary: 生成可用于重新创建 SQL Server 数据库邮件服务器的 Transact-SQL 脚本。
member.returns: A system object value that contains a list of Transact-SQL statements in the script.
member.param: The object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Mail.MailServer.SetAccount(System.String,System.Security.SecureString)
member.summary: 设置邮件服务器帐户。
member.param: A string value that contains the username.
A that contains the password.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Mail.MailServer.SetAccount(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 设置邮件服务器帐户。
member.param: A string value that contains the username.
A that contains the password.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Mail.MailServer.SetPassword(System.Security.SecureString)
member.summary: 设置密码。

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Mail.MailServer.SetPassword(System.String)
member.summary: 设置用户帐户的密码。

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Mail.MailServer.EnableSsl
member.summary: 获取或设置是否启用安全套接字层。
member.returns: A Boolean value that indicates the result of the operation, True if Ssl enabled, otherwise False.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Mail.MailServer.NoCredentialChange
member.summary: 获取或设置是否可以更改凭据。
member.returns: A Boolean value that specifies whether credentials can be changed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Mail.MailServer.Parent
member.summary: 获取或设置是 对象的父对象的 对象。
member.returns: A object value that specifies the parent of the object.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Mail.MailServer.Port
member.summary: 获取或设置邮件服务器的端口设置。
member.returns: An value that specifies the port address setting for the mail server associated with the referenced mail server.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Mail.MailServer.ServerType
member.summary: 获取邮件服务器的类型。
member.returns: A value that specifies the type of mail server, such as Microsoft Exchange Server, Internet Message Access Protocol (IMAP), or Post Office Protocol 3 (POP3).

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Mail.MailServer.UseDefaultCredentials
member.summary: 获取或设置是否使用默认凭据。
member.returns: A Boolean value that specifies whether to use default credentials.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Mail.MailServer.UserName
member.summary: 获取或设置与所引用邮件服务器关联的用户名。
member.returns: A value that specifies the name of the user associated with the referenced mail server.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Mail.MailServerCollection
member.summary: 类表示 对象的集合，这些对象表示在 SQL Server 数据库邮件子系统上定义的所有邮件服务器。

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Mail.MailServerCollection.Item(System.String)
member.summary: 按名称获取集合中的 对象。
